attributes.action: To pay the UK coastguard in line with other emergency workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK coastguard personnel - watchkeepers and watchkeeping assistants are vital in the provision of safety to ships, mariners and coast users. They are paid a pittance in comparison to other emergency services.. salaries start at 12,500 GBP pa compared to police (£22,000 pa), firefighters (£20,000). 
To equalize pay for the 1200 MCGA staff would cost only about 9 -12 million pounds per year, 
We the undersigned believe this amount of money is minimal in safeguarding the safety of our shores, seas and the people who use them.
